attributes.action: introduce a law requiring all learner drivers to learn more about HGV's on the road
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: as a proffessional driver myself i see so many new drivers having incidents with large or slower moving vehicles on the roads, it should be made law that all new drivers of cars and motorcycles attend a course on HGV awareness, there they would learn the practicalities of how HGV's operate, what a 44ton vehicle is like to drive and show the dangers of blind spots that such a large vehicle has
